content: kitchener stitch ears use someyarn or ribbon to make the ears as shownon the schematics beginning from the side thread using running stitch to the top of the hat then thread back to the side again so you end up at the same point where you started try making the returning stitches opposite of the first ones pull the two tails of the yarn/ribbon to shape the ear and secure it repeat for the second ear © 2020 by tsvetelina shopova all rights reservedpage3 finishing weave inthe ends and block as desired © 2020 by tsvetelina shopova all rights reservedpage4
